trans-unit.source: An inline-level flow content element used to host a figure.
trans-unit.target: 用來裝載圖形的內嵌層級非固定格式內容項目。

trans-unit.source: A *figure* is a portion of flow content with placement properties that can be customized independently from the primary content flow within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 「圖形」是非固定格式內容的一部分，具有可以與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument" /> 內的主要內容流程分開自訂的位置屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> enforces a strong content model for child content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> 會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。

trans-unit.source: See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> content model.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[TextElement 內容模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)如需有關<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>內容模型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> elements are often used to highlight or accentuate portions of content, to host supporting images or other content within the main content flow, or to inject loosely related content such as advertisements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> 或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater>項目通常用於反白顯示，或強調部分內容、 影像或其他內容中主要的內容流程支援的主機，或將鬆散相關內容，例如廣告。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> differ in several ways and are used for different scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> 和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater>數種方式不同，而且會用於不同的案例。

trans-unit.source: **Figure:**
Can be positioned: You can set its horizontal and vertical anchors to dock it relative to the page, content, column or paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 可以定位︰可以設定其水平和垂直錨點，將它固定在頁面、內容、資料行或段落的相對位置。

trans-unit.source: You can also use its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.VerticalOffset%2A> properties to specify arbitrary offsets.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用其<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalOffset%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.VerticalOffset%2A>屬性，以指定任意位移。

trans-unit.source: Is sizable to more than one column: You can set <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> height and width to multiples of page, content or column height or width.
trans-unit.target: 可調整大小時到一個以上的資料行： 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>高度和寬度頁面、 內容或資料行的高度或寬度的倍數。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the case of page and content, multiples greater than 1 are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果是頁面及內容，倍數不能大於 1。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> to be "0.5 page" or "0.25 content" or "2 Column".
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以設定的寬度<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>0.5 頁面 」、 「 0.25 內容 」 或 「 2 的資料行 」。

trans-unit.source: You can also set height and width to absolute pixel values.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以將高度和寬度設為絕對像素值。

trans-unit.source: Does not paginate: If the content inside a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> does not fit inside the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>, it will render whatever content does fit and the remaining content is lost
trans-unit.target: 未編頁： 如果內部內容<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>未符合內部<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>，它會呈現未符合任何內容的其餘內容將會遺失

trans-unit.source: **Floater:**
trans-unit.target: **Floater：**

trans-unit.source: Cannot be positioned and will render wherever space can be made available for it.
trans-unit.target: 無法定位，但會轉譯任何可用的空間。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the offset or anchor a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater>.
trans-unit.target: 您不能設定位移或錨點<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater>。

trans-unit.source: Cannot be sized to more than one column: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> sizes at one column.
trans-unit.target: 無法調整為多個資料行： 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater>在一個資料行的大小。

trans-unit.source: It has a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater.Width%2A> property that can be set to an absolute pixel value, but if this value is greater than one column width it is ignored and the floater is sized at one column.
trans-unit.target: 它有<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater.Width%2A>屬性可以設為絕對像素值，但如果這個值是大於則會忽略它的一個資料行寬度] 和 [浮動器的大小調整為一個資料行。

trans-unit.source: You can size it to less than one column by setting the correct pixel width, but sizing is not column-relative, so "0.5Column" is not a valid expression for <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> width.
trans-unit.target: 大小不超過一個資料行藉由設定正確的像素寬度，但調整大小不是資料行相關，因此 「 0.5Column"不是有效的運算式<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater>寬度。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> has no height property and it's height cannot be set, it’s height depends on the content
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> 沒有高度屬性，而且無法設定高度時，它的高度取決於內容

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> paginates: If its content at its specified width extends to more than 1 column height, floater breaks and paginates to the next column, the next page, etc.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> 編頁： 如果在指定的寬度其內容延伸到 1 個以上的資料行高度，浮動器會中斷，並會分頁至下一個資料行，下一個頁面等。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> is a good place to put standalone content where you want to control the size and positioning, and are confident that the content will fit in the specified size.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> 若要將獨立內容適合您想要用來控制大小和定位和確信內容將放在指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> is a good place to put more free-flowing content that flows similar to the main page content, but is separated from it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> 是將多個自由的內容流程類似於主頁面內容，但是它分隔的好地方。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> that contains both <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> elements.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>，同時包含<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>項目。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how this example renders.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument")
trans-unit.target: ![螢幕擷取畫面： Flowdocument 中及數字的 FlowDocument](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "螢幕擷取畫面： Flowdocument 中及數字的 FlowDocument")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 類別的新的空執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> object specifying the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 物件，用來指定新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 的初始內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> object as the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 物件做為新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 的初始內容。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> object specifying the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 物件，用來指定新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 的初始內容。

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be <see langword="null" />, in which case no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可能是 <see langword="null" />，在這個情況下，不會插入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> element after it is created, or <see langword="null" /> for no automatic insertion.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" />，指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 項目在建立之後所要插入的位置，<see langword="null" /> 表示不會自動插入。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> object as the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />, and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> specifying an insertion position for the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 物件做為新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 的初始內容，以及會替新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> 項目指定插入位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this figure can delay its placement in the flow of content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示此圖是否可以在內容流程中延遲其放置。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this figure can delay placement; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果此圖中可能會延遲位置; 否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **true**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是**true**。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.CanDelayPlacement" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.CanDelayPlacement" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the height of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 項目的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structure specifying the height characteristics for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構，指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 的高度特性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.<see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" />
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.<see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: = **1.0** and <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.<see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType" />
trans-unit.target: = **1.0**和<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />。<see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType" />

trans-unit.source: = <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: = <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Auto" />。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Height" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Height" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the position that content is anchored to in the horizontal direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示內容在水平方向錨定 (Anchor) 到的位置。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureHorizontalAnchor" /> enumeration specifying a horizontal anchor location for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureHorizontalAnchor" /> 列舉型別的成員，用來指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 的水平錨定 (Anchor) 位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureHorizontalAnchor.ColumnRight" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureHorizontalAnchor.ColumnRight" />。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalAnchor%2A> attribute of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalAnchor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalAnchor%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalAnchor%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalAnchor" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalAnchor" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the distance that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> is offset from its baseline in the horizontal direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 在水平方向相對於基準的位移距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> is offset from its baseline in the horizontal direction, in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 在水平方向相對於基準的位移距離，以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **0.0**.
XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than **0.0** but smaller than <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>值等於或大於**0.0**但小於<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 不合格的值是以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值 （如上所述），(excepting `Auto`) 後面接著一個下列單元規範： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` is inches; 1in==96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
trans-unit.target: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px

trans-unit.source: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalOffset" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the position that content is anchored to in the vertical direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示內容在垂直方向錨定 (Anchor) 到的位置。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureVerticalAnchor" /> enumeration specifying a vertical anchor location for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureVerticalAnchor" /> 列舉型別的成員，用來指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 的垂直錨定 (Anchor) 位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureVerticalAnchor.ParagraphTop" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureVerticalAnchor.ParagraphTop" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.VerticalAnchor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>項目。

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.VerticalAnchor" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the distance that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> is offset from its baseline in the vertical direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 在垂直方向與其基準線的位移距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> is offset from its baseline in the vertical direction, in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 之間的距離，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />垂直方向與裝置無關的像素的其基準的位移。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **0.0**.
XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than **0.0** but smaller than <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>值等於或大於**0.0**但小於<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 不合格的值是以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值 （如上所述），(excepting `Auto`) 後面接著一個下列單元規範： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` is inches; 1in==96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
trans-unit.target: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px

trans-unit.source: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.VerticalOffset" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the width of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 項目的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structure specifying the width characteristics for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構，指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 的寬度特性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.<see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" />
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.<see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: = **1.0** and <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.<see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType" />
trans-unit.target: = **1.0**和<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />。<see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType" />

trans-unit.source: = <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: = <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the allowable ways in which content can flow around a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示容許內容可以在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 周圍串流的方式。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WrapDirection" /> enumeration specifying the allowable ways in which content can flow around a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.WrapDirection" /> 列舉型別的成員，用來指定容許內容可以在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 周圍串流的方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.WrapDirection.Both" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.WrapDirection.Both" />。
